Hai Thanh Phan

Electrical and Computer Engineering Department • Cylab • Carnegie Mellon University

CMU Email: haithanp AT andrew DOT cmu DOT edu

CIC Building

5000 Forbes Avenue

Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania 15213

I am a Ph.D. student at CMU, Pittsburgh, PA.

Research Interests
My research interests are Machine Learning and Deep Learning for Computer Vision. I am interested in desiging compact neural architectures using recent automated Machine Learning (auto ML) approaches: Evolutionary algorithm, Reinforcement Learning.

I obtained my master’s degree from CMU, advised by Prof.Marios Savvides. Prior to that, I got my bachelor’s degree in Computer Science at University of Science, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, advised by Prof.Triet Minh Tran and Dr. Son Thai Tran.

I worked as a Software Engineer and ML/AI Research Engineer at Misfit/Fossil group, a wearable devices company for 3 years.

I then worked as a ML/AI Research Engineer at Axon Enterprise, a company working on on-body camera for polices worldwide.

Currently, along with my PhD program at CMU, I worked at Cylab as a research assistant.

I served as a reviewer of IEEE Access, ICLR 2019, and ICLR 2020.

News

Feb 16, 2020 Our paper Binarizing MobileNet via Evolution-based Searching got accepted at CVPR 2020!
Aug 25, 2019 Our paper MoBiNet: A Mobile Binary Network for Image Classification got accepted at WACV2020
